algorithm_technique: Greedy approach by maximizing changes per operation
problem_summary_simple: Make sums of two arrays equal with minimum operations by changing values (1-6).
problem_summary_technical: Greedy strategy to equalize array sums by prioritizing largest possible increments/decrements using frequency counts.
key_insights: The core idea is to make the largest possible change in each step.
Calculate the difference and then greedily apply operations to reduce it.
Handle the case where sums cannot be made equal by checking array length constraints.
